text: are you a commuter stuck in the city rat
race again yearning for a simpler life
about email or constant phone updates
perhaps you fantasize of the simple life
of the herdsman tending to his flock
well you may be surprised to learn that
they too are now desperate to be online
so they can check their latest updates
in the case of these herdsmen in western
Turkey they are so desperate that
they've turned their donkeys into mobile
charging points each solar panel that
the donk is a tethered to can generate
between five to seven kilowatts of
electricity oblivious to their new role
the donkeys can carry these solar panels
over long distances before becoming
static charging points they even offer
shade while you are idly browsing the
net it seems that everyone these days
wants to be online all the time
Dougal Shaw BBC news
